main.​ XPS_typ_HashmapCollection
Description
<TypeDefinition>

stores only <HashmapObjects> which match AllowedTypes array in a Items <hashmap>.

Parent

none

Implements

XPS_ifc_ICollection

Flags

none

Authors

Crashdome

Properties
AllowedTypes
get "AllowedTypes"
<Array> of <Strings>

List of allowed types when using AddItem method

Items
get "Items"
<Hashmap>

Storage of <HashmapObjects> for this collection

Methods
#create
_myobj = createhashmapobject ["XPS_type_HashmapCollection",[_allowedTtypes]];
Parameters
_allowedTypes

<Array> of <Strings> - used to limit which types of <HashmapObjects> are allowed to be added to the Items store. Checks against the '#type' result of item added

Returns

<HashmapObject>

RegisterType
call ["RegisterType",[_type]];
Parameters
_type

<String> - used to add a type after object creation.

Returns
<Boolean>

<True> if successfully added, otherwise <False>

AddItem
call ["AddItem",[_key,_item]];
Parameters
_key

Anything - Key used when adding to Items store

_item

<HashmapObject> - to add to Items store

Returns
<Boolean>

<True> if successfully added, otherwise <False>

RemoveItem
call ["RemoveItem",[_key]];
Parameters
_key

Anything - Key of item to remove from Items store

Returns
<Boolean>

<True> if successfully added, otherwise <False>
